title: legendaryracers
author: legendaryracers
content: Unarguably, QizonCoin is one such crypto coin that is recently being introduced in the crypto space with the unique concept of eco-friendly transportation.Its staking and referral programs offer various opportunities for investors to make passive income, hence, making it an enticing prospect. Furthermore, its unwavering focus on security promotes trust in asset protection.So, regardless of the fact whether you are a trader enthusiast or a newbie in the crypto industry, Qizon Coin acts as an enticing platform that is aimed toward exceptional growth.Its unique concept to offer sustainability promotes environmental preservation. So, what are you looking for? Consider investing in Qizon Coin to promote a sustainable future while participating in making this earth a greener planet.Follow us: Telegram | Twitter

So, what are you looking for? Consider investing in Qizon Coin to promote a sustainable future while participating in making this earth a greener planet.Follow us: Telegram | TwitterYou said Qizon is a coin. So what is the consensus mechanism of the Qizon coin? Can you share the whitepaper of the project?Â  What are the differences between your project compared with the other eco-friendly projects?

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: How do they write down their total supply? Is that 3,000,000,000? I think writing 3,000M is not the right way to write the number. That's a lot of money and I don't think the coin will ever touch $1.Then with the business model they offer. Isn't that a standard business model with new projects in general? I think there is nothing unique about this.Eco-friendly transportation? How do they make that happen? Isn't it better to seek funding from large investors like Softbank?Quote

comments.author: benalexis12
comments.body: Why did you make a separate topic again about this on Qizon Coin when you already have a topic made? This is the first link you made https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465588.0Is it because the staff here in the forum that this project you are promoting is a possible red flag right away, and this is what I saw on your website? Do you avoid criticism that you read about the subject you are working on? The way you promote here on Qizoncoin is not good, to be honest. No offense to you, op.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Making profit in any newly introduced coin, at first what you have to do is understand the concept of the coin and how potential will be the coin, and secondly, if a coin doesn't have good potential it's not worth to invest or purchase, because their is every tendency that the coin might lose value on the process of keeping the coin for the development of the coin, sometimes when bearish market comes not all altcoins survive the market, so for a new coin to survive the market you have to check the potentiality of the coin and if it have a reputation.

comments.author: dlightag
comments.body: Making a profits in cryptocurrency is determined by your entry point, and where is Qizon coin is trading and what is the utility of the Coin, for better understanding can you share the whitepepper and website here to know more about the project.Thanks.

comments.author: Venik
comments.body: OP us so busy that he's not responding to anyone. Funny thing is that there are 2 threads about this coin already, and it seems like someone just made a shitcoin and trying to promote it, nothing more.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: I actually don't want to respond to this topic that you created, because it seems like you are creating spam blindly. Previously you made the same topic here, hey mate, if you act as a promoter of the project and want everyone to know the latest updates on your project, you better make [ANN] on the appropriate board.A little advice for Qizon Coin team, it's not 2016 where people still trust buying tokens directly, so it's better for you to at least use a third party like PinkSale so that people have the confidence to buy, because even if you guys have a good idea but people don't have trust it will be useless.
